sessions.title: Maximizing development team success with effective platform engineering techniques
sessions.description:
Are your development teams tired of requesting resources through tickets that take max 5 business days to complete? Imagine empowering them to provision resources instantly, boosting productivity and focus while maintaining architectural integrity, compliance, and security.

By implementing strategic methods and Microsoft Architecture patterns using Terraform and GO, development teams can deploy application infrastructure on-demand with minimal configuration on Azure. This allows your development teams with any level of skill to set up well designed infrastructure 70% faster themselves.

Join this session as we go on an adventure transforming platform engineering into a powerful tool for empowering development teams.

We will end the session on how detect these attack vectors using Microsoft Sentinel.
